name: Hydrogenic
description:
A postradial platformer made by Gabe (a.k.a me) in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 42. Post jam version here: https://elgabe.itch.io/hydrogenic-post Controls:
  • Right Arrow:  Move counter clockwise.
  • Left Arrow: Move clockwise.
  • Space Bar: Jump.
Credits:

It's... It's just me...
